page.title: 17Landscape
page.content: The{River Bourne}runs through our area.The landscape is{Rural.}There are two farms in the area{Warren Farm}and{ {Allington Farm.}We have part of the course of an old railway.We also have three small villages.There is a{ {Medieval Field System,}which is next to{Warren Farm.}The main land_cover of Newton Toney are{fields.}The soil of most peoples gardens in Newton Toney are{stoney}and{chalky.}The ancient evidence of buildings are that there was a old {railway station.}There is a wood in the area called{Witches wood} There are a lot of{hills}in our section.
